questions.question_text_1:
Fill in the blanks with appropriate options.
 (1)_______, the city of Mumbai is known as the birthplace and namesake of “Bollywood” in India. (2)_______, it is India’s commercial capital and is always buzzing with constant activity. (3)____________, Mumbai might seem too much for first-timers, being the ‘maximum city’ that it is, but on the other hand, the city also grows on one, creating its own love affair. (4)_________, a city does not get large simply because of its big buildings, but because of its people, more (5)__________.  Based on the above data, answer the given subquestions.
question_texts:
Fill in the blanks with appropriate options.
 (1)_______, the city of Mumbai is known as the birthplace and namesake of “Bollywood” in India. (2)_______, it is India’s commercial capital and is always buzzing with constant activity. (3)____________, Mumbai might seem too much for first-timers, being the ‘maximum city’ that it is, but on the other hand, the city also grows on one, creating its own love affair. (4)_________, a city does not get large simply because of its big buildings, but because of its people, more (5)__________.  Based on the above data, answer the given subquestions.

questions.question_text_1: Choose the correct answer for blank (1).
question_texts: Choose the correct answer for blank (1).

questions.question_text_1: ‘Did you know that Alex and John are moving to Bombay?’ If the emphasis is on ‘you’, then the meaning is that:
question_texts: ‘Did you know that Alex and John are moving to Bombay?’ If the emphasis is on ‘you’, then the meaning is that:

options.option_text: The speaker believes that the person they are talking to would not know thatAlex and John are moving to Bombay
The speaker is amazed that Alex and John are moving to a city like Bombay
The speaker is amazed that Alex and John, of all people, are moving to Bombay

questions.question_text_1: ‘Did you know that Alex and John are moving to Bombay?’ If the emphasis is on ‘know’, then the meaning is that:
question_texts: ‘Did you know that Alex and John are moving to Bombay?’ If the emphasis is on ‘know’, then the meaning is that:

options.option_text: The speaker believes that the person they are talking to would not know thatAlex and John are moving to Bombay
The speaker is amazed that Alex and John are moving to a city like Bombay
The speaker believes that the person they are talking to would react if theyknew that Alex and John were moving to Bombay.
The speaker is amazed that Alex and John, of all people, are moving toBombay.

questions.question_text_1: ‘Did you know that Alex and John are moving to Bombay?’ If the emphasis is on ‘Alex and John’, then the meaning is that:
question_texts: ‘Did you know that Alex and John are moving to Bombay?’ If the emphasis is on ‘Alex and John’, then the meaning is that:

options.option_text: The speaker believes that the person they are talking to would not know thatAlex and John are moving to Bombay
The speaker is amazed that Alex and John are moving to a city like Bombay
The speaker believes that the person they are talking to would react if theyknew that Alex and John were moving to Bombay.
The speaker is amazed that Alex and John, of all people, are moving toBombay.

questions.question_text_1: ‘Did you know that Alex and John are moving to Bombay?’ If the emphasis is on ‘moving’, then the meaning is that:
question_texts: ‘Did you know that Alex and John are moving to Bombay?’ If the emphasis is on ‘moving’, then the meaning is that:

options.option_text: The speaker believes that it is unbelievable that Alex and John are moving toBombay
The speaker is amazed that Alex and John are moving to a city like Bombay
The speaker believes that the person they are talking to would react if theyknew that Alex and John were moving to Bombay.
The speaker is amazed that Alex and John, whom he thought would never quittheir home cities/towns, and moving to another city

questions.question_text_1: ‘Did you know that Alex and John are moving to Bombay?’ If the emphasis is on ‘to’, then the meaning is that:
question_texts: ‘Did you know that Alex and John are moving to Bombay?’ If the emphasis is on ‘to’, then the meaning is that:

options.option_text: The speaker believes that it is unbelievable that Alex and John are moving toBombay
The speaker is amazed that Alex and John are moving to a city like Bombay
The speaker believes that the person they are talking to would react if theyknew that Alex and John were moving to Bombay.

questions.question_text_1: From the following sentences, identify the one carrying a predicative adjective.
question_texts: From the following sentences, identify the one carrying a predicative adjective.

options.option_text: That girl Isabella looks rather dedicated.
These shallow shores stretch through to eternity.
These fellows with bad grades must up their game.
That corroded tap was cleaned by Praveen.
